channel.title: 47nil on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in 47nil on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Less
item.description:
When I’m writing, I write. When I’m cooking, I cook. When I’m talking to someone, I put my phone away. The constant mental juggling that felt necessary before now feels exhausting. There’s something meditative about giving your full attention to a single task.

– 47nil
item.content:encoded:
